scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run create-env && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.create-env: npm run inst1 && conda env create -n myenv -f=environment.yml
scripts.inst1: su && apt-get install -y build-essential && apt-get install -y wget && apt-get clean && wget --quiet https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh -O ~/miniconda.sh && /bin/bash ~/miniconda.sh -b -p /opt/conda && export PATH=/opt/conda/bin:$PATH
